column11: SB1C Weaver Jn. – Edge Hill only. RA9/10 loaded freight vehicles are normally permitted between Weaver Jn. and Edge Hill only, but may also be permitted between Edge Hill and Liverpool Lime Street subject to the Territory Track Engineer granting special dispensation. Between Wavertree Jn. and Edge Hill station such vehicles must only be routed on the Down and Up Ditton Fast lines.
